de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater

Class InflaterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater.InflaterFactory

  • public final class InflaterFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class, which offers factory methods, which allow to initialize instances of the type Inflater.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Inflater createInflater(int viewId)
      Creates and returns an inflater, which allows to inflate views, which may be referenced by a specific resource id.
      static Inflater createInflater(android.view.View view)
      Creates and returns an inflater, which allows to inflate view, which are present as an instance of the class View.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createInflater

        public static Inflater createInflater(android.view.View view)
        Creates and returns an inflater, which allows to inflate view, which are present as an instance of the class View.
        Parameters:
        view - The view, which should be inflated, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        Returns:
        The inflater, which has been created, as an instance of the type Inflater

      • createInflater

        public static Inflater createInflater(int viewId)
        Creates and returns an inflater, which allows to inflate views, which may be referenced by a specific resource id.
        Parameters:
        viewId - The resource id of the view, which should be inflated by the inflater, as an Integer value. The id must correspond to a valid view resource
        Returns:
        The inflater, which has been created, as an instance of the type Inflater
